title: Make NumPy Array Your Shape
description: In this challenge, you will be presented with different sub-challenges that will require you to manipulate NumPy arrays to your desired shape. These sub-challenges will test your ability to reshape arrays, concatenate and stack arrays, and split arrays into multiple sub-arrays. By completing these sub-challenges, you will gain a deeper understanding of how to manipulate NumPy arrays and their dimensions.
